name: The Nidhogg Incident
description:
The Nidhogg Weapon has barely been contained by Yggdrasil, but without you investigating your corpses and saving the tree, it will never stop!


CREDITS: 

Philipp Roloff

Aline Drobek

Jacqueline Held
